price: If We willed, We could have taken away their sight, so they would rush to find their way, but then how could they see?
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
